name: Overdoki
description:
Overdoki is a modern 2d advanture game.

You are flying near the earth, but then your UFO crashes. You are in a dungeon and have to flee. At first the world seems deserted, but after a while you realize that you are not alone. The dungeon is guarded by goblins that you need to fight. You can escape the dungeon only to realize that you have to navigate a huge maze to find your UFO.

Overdoki is still in alpha. Expect Bugs!
Feel free to leave any suggestions in the comments below!

Music: https://pixabay.com/
